name: DGCP MaMeeFarm Proof 441 — Cutting Firewood for Cooking
description:
Daily subsistence labor activity at MaMeeFarm.

The image documents manual firewood cutting,
prepared for household cooking use.

This activity reflects off-grid energy reliance
and daily resource management under limited infrastructure.

Timestamp and DGCP watermark are embedded directly in the image.

DGCP | MMFARM-POL-2025
